before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"63tai","text":"Fill bucket with crushed ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"23l7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2q0n7","text":"Turn on centrifuge and start the fast temp program to reach 4◦ C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":61,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f5afr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ed6ec","text":"Cool SM buffer in ice bucket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6r3dh","text":"This protocol is for isolation of bacteriophages from fecal matter. It is based on the protocol used for the COPSAC10 cohort and was originally described by Ling Deng in doi:10.3390/v11070667. Extraction is performed using centrifugation and ultrafiltration to isolate viral particles and get rid of contaminants.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":115,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"10eod","text":"This protocol is designed for extraction of bacteriophages from fecal samples. The sample should be 50-500mg of fecal material diluted in buffer (2xSM buffer for instance). Sample sizes outside these limits have not been tested and correct sequencing results can not be guaranteed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"13d2o","text":"Equipment:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3tli9","text":"Pipettors","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3a1ro","text":"Shaking table","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c75ck","text":"Refrigerated centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eclfk","text":"Ice box","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bchub","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"apug","text":"Consumables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4cqp8","text":"Crushed ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b6eld","text":"15 ml centrifuge tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ch78","text":"10 ml pipettes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ejul","text":"0.45 um PES filters ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3fpi9","text":"SM buffer (200 mM NaCl, 10 mM MgSO4, 50 mM Tris-HCl, pH 7.5)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

Place centrifuge tube back in ice box","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1k9lg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"5DA00A202C0911EC9842A7AD0832CA28","id":"87665","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"60DE93502C0911EC9842A7AD0832CA28","id":"87666","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2lrrr","text":"Homogenize samples by placing ice box on shaking board at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1kk7f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":600,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"49A328402C0911EC9842A7AD0832CA28","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"300","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tciv","text":"Filter the supernatant  through a 0.45 um PES filter into a new centrifuge tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6put","text":"Transfer   of the sample to the outer chamber of the concentrator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"87oqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"20C323302C0911EC9842A7AD0832CA28","id":"87667","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t4ld","text":"Repeat the three previous steps until all liquid from the centrifuge tube has passed through the concentrator and the there is no liquid left in the inner chamber","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aum2r","text":"Add 100 ul SM buffer to the inner chamber and centrifuge   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b63d3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"1500","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0D8137702C0A11EC9842A7AD0832CA28","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4299s","text":"Leave in fridge to release VLPs from filter for at least 12 hours and at most for 1 week before proceeding with spotting or DNA/RNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m6sk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
